20101213014854.857|20101213014856.286|CCO|HEMORRHAGING JOBS, SOME GOING
20101213014856.286|20101213014857.714|CCO|OUT OF BUSINESS ALTOGETHER.
20101213014857.714|20101213014859.143|CCO|>> WHAT DO YOU THINK THE FUTURE
20101213014859.143|20101213014900.571|CCO|OF NEWSPAPERS IS AT THIS POINT?
20101213014900.571|20101213014902.000|CCO|>> IT'S ONLINE.
20101213014902.000|20101213014904.000|CCO|IT'S THE DIGITAL AGE.
20101213014904.000|20101213014906.000|CCO|>> Reporter: VACARRO, WHO AT
20101213014906.000|20101213014908.000|CCO|AGE 24, HAS ALREADY BEEN FIRED
20101213014908.000|20101213014910.000|CCO|FROM TWO NEWSPAPER JOBS, IS PART
20101213014910.000|20101213014912.000|CCO|OF A NEW VENTURE CALLED "PATCH"
20101213014912.000|20101213014914.000|CCO|RUN BY A.O.L., IT HAS A NETWORK
20101213014914.000|20101213014916.000|CCO|OF LOCAL ONLINE SITES SPREAD

20101213014918.000|20101213014920.000|CCO|EVERYTHING FROM POLITICS TO
20101213014920.000|20101213014922.000|CCO|FIRES TO HIGH SCHOOL FOOTBALL.
20101213014922.000|20101213014923.667|CCO|>> AS TRADITIONAL MEDIA OUTLETS
20101213014923.667|20101213014925.333|CCO|SCALE BACK OUT OF LOCAL
20101213014925.333|20101213014927.000|CCO|COMMUNITY, PATCH IS FILLING A
20101213014927.000|20101213014928.667|CCO|REAL NEED AND A REAL VOID.
20101213014928.667|20101213014930.333|CCO|>> Mitchell: AS PATCH
20101213014930.333|20101213014932.000|CCO|PRESIDENT WARREN WEBSTER POINTS
20101213014932.000|20101213014934.000|CCO|OUT, CREATING MUCH-NEED JOBS.
20101213014934.000|20101213014936.000|CCO|>> PATCH IS THE LARGEST HIRER OF
20101213014936.000|20101213014938.000|CCO|JOURNALISTS THIS YEAR.
